NTT DATA Services currently seeks a Data Modeler to join our team in Brighton, Massachusetts (US-MA), United States (US).

 

 

 

NTT DATA Services currently seeks a Data Modeler –to join our team in Boston MA, United States (US).

This candidate will be part of a team made up of Project Managers, Database and Web Developers, Data Modelers, DBAs, Business Analysts, Report Analysts, EDH group and ETL Specialists. 

 

THIS IS A FTE OPPORTUNITY WITH BENEFITS

 

Role Responsibilities

- The candidate will be responsible for the design, implementation, support and maintenance of relational database model systems

- Creation/maintenance of conceptual, logical and physical data models,

- Database solution design. In this role the candidate will recommend and monitor overall standards and procedures,

- Provide solution design guidance to other technical staff, and assist in integrating various systems.

- Consult with users to determine requirements needed to guide development of the data models.

- Data warehouse expertise in OLAP and relational modeling (3NF/OLTP) with a wide repertoire of domain experiences

- Working with day to day Repository Management activities like Model Merging, User Role Creation, User Access Grants,

 -Model Freezing and Model Version Management

-Responsible for reverse engineering and synchronizing existing legacy data models

 

Basic qualification 

5+ years of experience as an Architect or Data Modeler on data warehouse projects using relational and No-SQL technologies

ERwin or other data modeling software

Requirements

Logical and physical data modeling experience

Working with technical developers to strategize solutions to align with business requirements

Working with end users/customers to understand requirements for technical solutions to meet business needs

Identifying and initiating resolutions to customer problems and concerns associated with a data warehouse

Analyze project requirements and developing detailed specifications

Defining standards and best practices and conducting code reviews

Developing service and ad hoc oriented data models

Education

Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience

 

 

 

This position is only available to those interested in direct staff employment opportunities with NTT DATA, Inc. or its subsidiaries. Please note, 1099 or corp-2-corp contractors or the equivalent will NOT be considered. We offer a full comprehensive benefits package that starts from your first day of employment.
